channel.title: netconf on Prasenjit Manna
channel.description: Recent content in netconf on Prasenjit Manna

item.title: NETCONF vs RESTCONF
item.description: NETCONF vs RESTCONF NETCONF is a protocol that was developed to provide a standardized interface to Network Element(NE)/Device to retrieve and manipulate configuration data. Till now, CLI is the standard interface to interact with NE. but this is mainly for human. On the other hand, the NETCONF is mainly used for network automation. CLI normally defined for human in user friendly way. | Content | Config, Oper Data | |——————-+————————————+ | Operations | , , , , , , , | | Messages | , , | | Secure Transport | SSH, TLS |
